12A4 in binary: 0001001010100100
1C35 in binary: 0001110000110101
100 in binary: 0000000100000000
115C in binary: 0001000101011100


0001 0010 1010 0100 in hexadecimal: 12A4
0001 1100 0011 0101 in hexadecimal: 1C35
0001 0000 0000 in hexadecimal: 100
0001 0001 0101 1100 in hexadecimal: 115C
